name: Dam Shooter
description:
This is my second game!

It's a 2D PVP Shooter. This is just the base version, I plan on implementing new stuff and expanding on the idea. Play it in Fullscreen for best experience. Hope you Enjoy!

Shoutout to Blackthornprod https://www.youtube.com/@Blackthornprod

I used some of the assets from their asset pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/100-fantasy-characters-mega-...
